text: aur khuda aur usake rasool kee taraph se haj akabar ke din (tum) logon ko munaadee kee jaatee hai ki khuda aur usaka rasool musharikon se bezaar (aur alag) hai to (musharikon) agar tum logon ne (ab bhee) tauba kee to tumhaare haq mein yahee behatar hai aur agar tum logon ne (isase bhee) munh moda to samajh lo ki tum log khuda ko haragiz aajiz nahin kar sakate aur jin logon ne kuphr ikhteyaar kiya unako dardanaak azaab kee khush khabaree de do
